## Professional Summary

Final-year PhD candidate at UCL's Social Research Institute with 4+ years' experience evaluating social policies using advanced quantitative methods, administrative data, and mixed methods approaches. Published researcher with a track record of translating complex statistical analyses into policy-relevant outputs and integrating qualitative insights, including evidence contributing to current UK parliamentary legislation. Expert in causal inference, quasi-experimental design, and secure data management across ONS and UCL platforms.
